drug.name: Salvia miltiorrhiza root
drug.description: Salvia miltiorrhiza root is a plant/plant extract used in some OTC (over-the-counter) products. It is not an approved drug.

synonyms.synonym: Fuzheng Huayu Component Radix Salvia Miltiorrhizae

product.name: Female Care Honzo Seika Chinese Herbal Aroma Oil
Female Care Honzo Seika Chinese Herbal Aroma Oil

mixture.name: Female Care Honzo Seika Chinese Herbal Aroma Oil
Female Care Honzo Seika Chinese Herbal Aroma Oil
